name: Inspire Footprints - Journey, Choose Your Path [Sim/Simulator/Directory]
name_original: Inspire Footprints - Journey, Choose Your Path [Sim/Simulator/Directory]
description:
"IF we could aspire to give back to the world and to others just a portion of what we've gained, used or received, maybe at the end, we would truly leave a footprint worth following."



Inspire Footprints is an application and directory designed to help you explore your own unique path and begin a journey of education, motivation and inspiration. Find your path or create your own. Journey into an adventure that can help you to make a positive impact for your life, our world and the people around you.

From education, (physical/mental) health, self help, animal life, the environment, culture and art, our network and directory helps to provide content and categories for software applications, games, music and other digital products found on Steam that can make a positive impact on your life and the world around us.

Our listings are greatly based on games and software found on Steam that can help inspire, motivate or help to contribute in some positive way to improve the lives of others and the world around them. We also provide listings for other inspirational or motivational organizations, groups, communities and opportunities as well.

Member Access:

As a member, you will have access to create one listing, rate and review other listings and participate in unique community activities and events.

Developer Access:

If you are a video game or software developer, part of an organization or have products or services that reflect our vision and conditions, you will have access to multiple listing placements, feature exposure, news placement, launch events and other opportunities.

"Small steps can always lead to a broader path but it always begins with one step."
